name: Jumpland Underground (Alpha)
description:
Help the guest get through Jumpland's various obstacles by manipulating parts of the level from the underground service tunnel.

Originally Made as part of the Ludum Dare 29 game jam. (The jam version is still available to play for free here)

THIS IS AN ALPHA: Note that this is still considered an early alpha release, so there is a lot that could be added or changed over time. Also there may be many bugs or other issues as I add more content and features, so feel free to send any feedback or bug reports to kugrou@gmail.com. In particular know that OSX and Linux builds will normally be untested, though they generally shouldn't have any issues not present in the Windows version.
